Tryck på en valfri tangent för att fortsätta...

Ok I get this error When I have added My coloured whips. I attached the CombatAssistant.java
Is there anything wrong with this:

		} else if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 5698 || (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 16022 || (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 16023 || (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 16024 && o.poisonDamage <= 0 && Misc.random(3) == 1) {
			o.getPA().appendPoison(13);
			c.bonusAttack += damage/3;

			c.bonusAttack += damage/3;
